titleStmt.title: Another declaration: wherein is rendred, a further account of the just grouuds [sic] and reasons of the dissolving the Parliament; by the Lord Generall and his Council of Officers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Brewer, and are to be sold at the Royal Exchange in Ccrnhil [sic].,
